TopicTitle: maneuver node doesn't work at all

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I encounter a weird issue which makes maneuver node impossible to add at all !

got this in log:

[PlanetariumCamera]: Focus: Minmus base core propulsion helper

dT is NaN! tA: 4.53540432453156, E: 0, M: 0, T: NaN

dT is NaN! tA: 4.54552125930786, E: 0, M: 0, T: NaN

dT is NaN! tA: 4.54561769962311, E: 0, M: 0, T: NaN

dT is NaN! tA: 4.54592299461365, E: 0, M: 0, T: NaN

dT is NaN! tA: 4.54601383209229, E: 0, M: 0, T: NaN

dT is NaN! tA: 4.54732930660248, E: 0, M: 0, T: NaN

Maneuver Mode toggle

Maneuver Mode enabled

Switching to map and get back doesn't help (we never know ).

EDIT: after a restart, it's work again.

Does anyone get this ?

Any workaround by chance ?

Edited October 29, 2014 by Justin Kerbice
I had what might be the same issue (unable to place a maneuver node, "dT is NaN!" in the log), and I was able to "fix" it by switching to the Space Center and then back to the ship in question.
